PlacesOfInterest.Name: Southport Counting House
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A grand financial institution where merchants and adventurers alike can store their wealth and conduct business transactions.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Harborside
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A cozy harbor-side hovel with a fireplace.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Beacon's Rest
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A newer style home built right near the city beacon.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Bridgeway
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A sturdy manor built on the connecting bridge between the two halves of Southport.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Thespian's Rest
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A small apartment built specifically for the actors and performers of Southport's theater district.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Woodworker's Shop
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A workshop where skilled artisans craft furniture, tools, and other wooden goods for the residents of Southport.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Plaza View
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A quaint, small home near the West Southport Plaza.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Alley Dwelling
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A cheap apartment built in the back alleys of Southport, often rented by the less fortunate residents of the city.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Lakeside Manor
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A spacious house by the lake.

PlacesOfInterest.Name: Chauntea's Refuge
PlacesOfInterest.Description: A farm with a small house. Perfect for sharecroppers or those who want to live off the land.
